ScriptTransformer (autotransform.transformer.script)

The implementation for the ScriptTransformer.

class autotransform.transformer.script.ScriptTransformer(params: autotransform.transformer.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer[autotransform.transformer.script.ScriptTransformerParams]

A Transformer that makes changes using an invoked script. Sentinel values can be used in the args to supply information from the Batch. The available sentinel values for args are:

<<KEY>>: A json encoded list of the input files for a batch. If the per_item flag is set in

params, this will simply be the key of an Item.

<<EXTRA_DATA>>: A JSON encoded mapping from Item key to that Item’s extra_data. If the

per_item flag is set in params, this will simply be a JSON encoding of the Item’s extra_data. If extra_data is not present for an item, it is treated as an empty Dict.

<<METADATA>>: A JSON encoded version of the Batch’s metadata.

_FILE can be appended to any of these (i.e. <<KEY_FILE>>) and the arg will instead be replaced

with a path to a file containing the value.

_params

The script and args, along with the timeout and a per_item flag for invoking the script on each Item.

Type

ScriptTransformerParams

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.transformer.script.ScriptTransformer

Produces a ScriptTransformer from the provided data.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the ScriptTransformer.

Return type

ScriptTransformer

static get_type() → autotransform.transformer.type.TransformerType

Used to map Transformer components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Transformer.

Return type

TransformerType

transform(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Execute a transformation against the provided Batch. All writing should be done via CachedFile’s write_content method or FileItem’s write_content method to ensure operations are easily accessible to testing and file content cache’s are kept accurate.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch that will be transformed.
